LandscapeMgr::~LandscapeMgr() LandscapeMgr::~LandscapeMgr()
{ {
delete atmosphere; delete atmosphere;
delete cardinalsPoints; delete cardinalsPoints;
if (oldLandscape)
{
delete oldLandscape;
oldLandscape=NULL;
}
delete landscape; delete landscape;
landscape = NULL; landscape = NULL;
} }
